languages.text: "Чем старая Ризза может услужить почтеннейш{mf|ему|ей}? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Вольный Торговец{/d} изволит что-то купить, или продать? Вы не стесняйтесь — ребятки старой Риззы для вас все в лучшем виде сделают! А для партнеров у нас особые предложения".

traits.locale_text: "Чем старая Ризза может услужить почтеннейш{mf|ему|ей}? Вольный Торговец изволит что-то купить, или продать? Вы не стесняйтесь — ребятки старой Риззы для вас все в лучшем виде сделают! А для партнеров у нас особые предложения."
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."
languages.original_text: "Чем старая Ризза может услужить почтеннейш{mf|ему|ей}? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Вольный Торговец{/d} изволит что-то купить, или продать? Вы не стесняйтесь — ребятки старой Риззы для вас все в лучшем виде сделают! А для партнеров у нас особые предложения".

traits.locale_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the Rogue Trader wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's cats will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the Rogue Trader wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the Rogue Trader wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: “老莱萨该怎么为这位尊贵的客人服务？想买什么，还是想卖什么，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}行商浪人{/d}？别害羞，老莱萨的小伙子们会好好招待你的！而且，我们对商业伙伴还有特别优惠。”
languages.original_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: “老莱萨该怎么为这位尊贵的客人服务？想买什么，还是想卖什么，行商浪人？别害羞，老莱萨的小伙子们会好好招待你的！而且，我们对商业伙伴还有特别优惠。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: «¿En qué puede ayudar la vieja Ryzza a su excelencia? ¿Viene a comprar o a vender, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Comerciante Independiente{/d}? No sea tímid{mf|o|a}, ¡los muchachos de la vieja Ryzza sabrán cuidar de usted! Y tenemos ofertas especiales para socios comerciales».
languages.original_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: «¿En qué puede ayudar la vieja Ryzza a su excelencia? ¿Viene a comprar o a vender, Comerciante Independiente? No sea tímid{mf|o|a}, ¡los muchachos de la vieja Ryzza sabrán cuidar de usted! Y tenemos ofertas especiales para socios comerciales».
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: 「このライザ様にどんな御用だい？{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}自由開拓者{/d}は買いたいのか？それとも売る？どんな要件でもあたしの部下たちに任せな！ビジネスパートナーには特別割引も提供してるよ」
languages.original_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: 「このライザ様にどんな御用だい？自由開拓者は買いたいのか？それとも売る？どんな要件でもあたしの部下たちに任せな！ビジネスパートナーには特別割引も提供してるよ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: "Wie kann die alte Ryzza Eurem geschätzten Selbst dienen? Möchte {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/d} kaufen oder verkaufen? Nur keine Zurückhaltung – die Jungs der alten Ryzza werden Euch gut behandeln! Und wir haben immer Sonderangebote für Geschäftspartner."
languages.original_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: "Wie kann die alte Ryzza Eurem geschätzten Selbst dienen? Möchte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kaufen oder verkaufen? Nur keine Zurückhaltung – die Jungs der alten Ryzza werden Euch gut behandeln! Und wir haben immer Sonderangebote für Geschäftspartner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que la vieille Ryzza peut faire pour votre grandeur ? Qu'est-ce que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/d} voudrait acheter, ou vendre ? Ne soyez pas timide... Les gars de Ryzza vous traiteront comme {mf|un prince|une princesse} ! Et on a des offres spéciales pour nos partenaires commerciaux. »
languages.original_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que la vieille Ryzza peut faire pour votre grandeur ? Qu'est-ce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} voudrait acheter, ou vendre ? Ne soyez pas timide... Les gars de Ryzza vous traiteront comme {mf|un prince|une princesse} ! Et on a des offres spéciales pour nos partenaires commerciaux. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

languages.text: "Koca Ryzza'dan ne istersin efendim? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Hür Tacir{/d} bir şeyler almak mı yoksa satmak mı ister? Hiç çekinme... Koca Ryzza'nın oğlanları saygıda kusur etmez! İş ortaklarımız için özel indirimler de yaparız."
languages.original_text: "How can old Ryzza serve your esteemed self? Does the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallOfficial}Rogue Trader{/d} wish to buy, or sell? No need to be shy — old Ryzza's boys will treat you right! And we've got special offers for business partners."

traits.locale_text: "Koca Ryzza'dan ne istersin efendim? Hür Tacir bir şeyler almak mı, yoksa satmak mı ister? Hiç çekinme... Koca Ryzza'nın oğlanları saygıda kusur etmez! İş ortaklarımız için özel fırsatlarımız da var."
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "Koca Ryzza'dan ne istersin efendim? Hür Tacir bir şeyler almak mı yoksa satmak mı ister? Hiç çekinme... Koca Ryzza'nın oğlanları saygıda kusur etmez! İş ortaklarımız için özel indirimler de yaparız."
traits.speaker: Footfall_PirateVendor
